item.title: The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server.
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Error: The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. after upgrading php. Just run the below command on your terminal, which create symbolic link to your phpmyadmin directory. sudo ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin /var/www done..

The post The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Error:

The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. after upgrading php.

Just run the below command on your terminal, which create symbolic link to your phpmyadmin directory.

sudo ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin /var/www

done..

The post The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. appeared first on .
